name: Quaia_G20p5
flux_or_mag_cut: G < 20.5; |b|≥20°; selection-function corrected with provided 10× random catalogue; (selection_function_NSIDE64_G20.5.fits).
reference: Quaia catalogue (Gaia–unWISE; Schlafly et al. 2024) + in-house dipole estimate using provided randoms (vector-sum debias).
notes: x estimated from cumulative G-band counts in 18≤G≤20 range; α assumed ~0.5 (quasar optical Fν∝ν^-α). Errors are shot-noise floor + conservative 5° directional floor; systematics likely dominate.
z_notes: z_mean from redshift_quaia after the same sky cut; photometric estimate.
